" We seriously considered it, which for a small-town boy from Southern Indiana is a very humbling thing to do, " Mike Pence said Thursday. But at the end of the day, we ultimately believed that where our little family is led is somewhere in the service of the people of Indiana in the days ahead. I've learned in decisions like these to follow my heart. My heart is in Indiana.
